website_summaries.verdict: If other cake lifters have proven too heavy for you, try this lightweight model from Cake Boss.
pros: Stainless-steel blade with rubberized nylon handle
Dishwasher safe, though hand washing is recommended
Lifts even very dense, rich cakes
cons: Some soft cakes may stick to the lifter, even if floured

customer_reviews.title: This is More Than Just A Cake Lifter.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of baking and this cake lifter can be used for more than just moving cake layers. I have used it to move a loaf of bread from my kitchen counter to the baking pan. Or used it to move biscuits to the baking pan. Whether you are moving a layer cake or bread dough this will help to keep your product from losing its shape. Or you can move pie dough to a pie plate. I like the larger size and it can easily handle a larger cake layer to the smaller top layer. The offset handle makes it easy to hold. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M. GroveTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: also makes a good pizza peel/pie crust holder
customer_reviews.text: perfect size, perfect price. very sturdy. I had an old plastic cake spatula that was doing the trick, but I was looking for something sturdier and more compact to transfer/flip pie crust from counter to pie plate in one piece when it was too flaky to stay on the rolling pin. The pizza peel was too big and cumbersome; this works great
customer_reviews.author: SveltCelt

customer_reviews.title: What a great price for such an essential kitchen item
customer_reviews.text: What a great price for such an essential kitchen item. Have you ever tried to stack cakes or transfer a piping hot pizza from a cast iron skillet to a plate? This is a life saver! I really enjoy the rounded shape because it makes stacking cakes a breeze. The handle is very thick and sturdy and I don't worry about dropping cakes or pizza when using it. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a cake decorating class and have used it since the class several times. This cake lifter is worth the higher price. It is very sturdy, good quality, and holds the weight of your dense cakes like a champ. When making a cake that you want to look good, it's nice to know you don't have to worry your cake lifter will fail when stacking layers or moving your cake from the turn table to its display.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected but will be perfect for lifting cakes and for putting them in boxes ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot wait to use this. Bigger than I expected but will be perfect for lifting cakes and for putting them in boxes to give as gifts
customer_reviews.author: Angela C. Scudder

customer_reviews.title: great for handling thin layers and softer
customer_reviews.text: use it 2-3 times a week as we always have fresh cake at home, great for handling thin layers and softer cakes
customer_reviews.author: Yamile Carpio

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: It is great. Used it to remove a cream cheese cake from the bottom of a springform pan. No problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: I've been baking cakes for some time and didn't think ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been baking cakes for some time and didn't think I needed this. I'm surprised at how much I use it. It's made it so much easier to move larger cakes that have a bit of weight to them.
customer_reviews.author: Faith B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a big help when I am stacking cakes! It is light weight and easy to use with the handle to scoop up the cake and place it where you need it, especially when you might have already put fondant on it! Best investment as a cake baker I could have made! If my review was helpful, please let me know by clicking yes! Happy baking!
customer_reviews.author: Cass Monty

customer_reviews.title: used it last night for the first time and loved it! It made transferring my layers of cake ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this item, used it last night for the first time and loved it! It made transferring my layers of cake from the pan to the cake plate so much easier. If you are tired of your cakes "breaking" when attempting to remove them from the pan or transfer them to the decorating plate, this may be an investment you want to make. Kudos to the maker... I am pleased with it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !
customer_reviews.text: Great for moved cake layers around! I love this, it comes in handy. I used to transfer cake layers with just a spatula, but after a few mishaps I figured it was time to get a cake lifter. Now the size is about 10" wide at the widest pat of the circular flat area, so this is perfect for smaller cakes, I can move layers up to about 16" in diameter if I am careful. If you need something for larger cakes this may not be for you, but it was a good buy, especially if you make a lot of cakes!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Also, an easy way to store it is if you have the wire rack shelving in your pantry, slip it down between two wire bars near the wall. :) So easy to use and doesn't have that long handle like some others...which makes storing more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because it was VERY useful! I like that it is sturdy and easy to clean. I would definitely recommend this. I was making a 4-layered fruit cake and AFTER I placed the 3rd layer on the cake I realized the layers were too big. I used the cake lifer to carefully take all the layers off and re-trim them. I don't know how I could have fixed the cake without it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great cake lifter, and a real bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cake lifter! It's big enough to handle larger cake rounds, and I use it for other foods, too. Great value for the price and so well made, I know it will last for years and years!
customer_reviews.author: Flowerladytoo

Works great for transferring layers. The quality is excellent. The cake lifter is heavy duty and well constructed. I just ordered a back up!

product_meta.title: Cake Boss Stainless Steel Tools and Gadgets Cake Lifter, Red
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1| Style:RedCake will get a lift in the kitchen with the Cake Boss Stainless Steel Tools and Gadgets 9-Inch Cake Lifter. Cake Boss Tools and Gadgets make baking easy and enjoyable for novice and experienced bakers of all ages and this stainless steel cake lifter is the ideal tool for raising and moving cakes around the kitchen. This cake lifter features a soft-grip, rubberized handle for improved control and an easy-to-use design that slips easily under whole cakes, pie and other baked treats. Use it to lift warm cakes, pies and other baked goods from a cooling rack to a cake stand or plate. It's the perfect tool to move thinner torte layers or even sheets of pastry dough. The cake lifter is oven safe to 500DegreeF and is dishwasher safe, though hand washing is recommended. With this and other great equipment from the Cake Boss Tools and Gadgets collection, you can serve it up just like the Boss! Take the worry out of lifting and moving delicate cake layers and more with the Cake Boss Stainless Steel Tools and Gadgets 9-Inch Cake Lifter.
feature_bullets: The cake lifter is made from heavy-duty stainless steel to provide firm, reliable support
The rubberized handle is firmly attached for a dependable, confident and comfortable grip
Heat safe to 500 degrees Fahrenheit; the lifter is ideal for cakes as well as pies and other desserts
Dishwasher safe, though hand washing is recommended

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
